Pre-Game Insights: The West Indies squad undoubtedly has the edge on paper and looks like the superior side. They are also one of the most successful teams in the history of the tournament and have pedigree on their side. Expect the Windies to start their campaign on a winning note without any surprises.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Providence Stadium in Guyana is expected to offer equal assistance to both the batters and the bowlers. While a first-innings score in Guyana has been 150, pacers have taken 61.26% of wickets here. The team winning the toss might elect to field first.
A temperature of around 28°C, with high chances of rain, is forecast.
Others: The West Indies team and Papua New Guinea will kickstart the proceedings in Group C as both teams face each other on the opening day of the T20 World Cup 2024.
Under the dynamic leadership of Assad Vala, PNG will be making their second appearance at the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup.
